spans.content: IN THE SUPREME COURT OF NIGERIA
This appeal probes into the rightness of the decision of the
Court of Appeal, Akure Division (hereunder addressed as "the
lower court"), coram judice:S. Denton-West, M. A. Danjuma and
J.S. Abiriyi, JJCA, in Appeal NO. CAAK/148/2012, delivered on the
Juiy, 2014. In its judgment, the lower court affirmed the
